com.vgrs.xcode.common
Class Utf16

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vgrs.xcode.common.Utf16
public class Utf16
extends java.lang.Object

Statically implements various operations surrounding UTF-16 codepoints.

isDnsCompatible

public static boolean isDnsCompatible(char[] c)
Check if all characters in an input array are all DNS compatible. Ace uses this to determine if a label must be encoded
Parameters:
c - character array
Returns:
true if and only if all characters in the array are DNS compatible

isDnsCompatible

public static boolean isDnsCompatible(char c)
Check if the input character is DNS compatible. This method returns true if the input character is a letter, digit, or hyphen.
Parameters:
c - a character
Returns:
true if the character is DNS compatible, otherwise false

public static boolean isPrintable(int c)

Parameters:
c - an integer
Returns:
true if the integer is printable, false otherwise

expand

public static int[] expand(char[] input)
Expand a 16 bit sequence into 32 bits. Idna toUnicode has a corner case which returns the input if there is an error. The input is 16 bits wide and the output is 32 bits wide, so we need a convenient way to copy data from one type to the other.
Parameters:
input - is a character array
Returns:
output is an integer array whose low bytes match the input.

contract

public static char[] contract(int[] input)
Contract a 32 bit sequence into 16 bits. Useful when the input to Ace.encode does not require encoding.
Parameters:
input - is an integer array
Returns:
output is a char array matching low bytes of the input.
